contentencoded: America’s divorce rate soared in the 1970s. Thirty years later, kids who grew up in the divorce revolution look back at that experience, and describe how it shaped them as adults. The 1970s also offered some lessons on how to improve divorce for kids today.
description: America’s divorce rate soared in the 1970s. Thirty years later, kids who grew up in the divorce revolution look back […]
title: Divorced Kid
teaser: America’s divorce rate soared in the 1970s. Thirty years later, kids who grew up in the divorce revolution look back […]
